catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Yeshayah ben Yosef ha-Yaṿani
description: Contents: Maʾamarim u-feshaṭim shel pesuḳim ṿe-derushim (ff. 1r-26r). Beʾur sugyiot ba-Talmud ṿe-agadot Ḥazal (ff. 28r-40v). Philosophico-cabbalistical commentary on the Pentateuch (ff. 41r-156v). Philosophical homilies (ff. 158r-189v). Two homilies (ff. 191r-203v). Aggadic notes on biblical passages and fragments of homilies by various hands (ff. 204r-271v). Yeshayah ben Yosef ha-Yaṿani, Ets Ḥayim (ff. 273r-278r). Naḥmanides, Shaʿare ha-Tsedeḳ = Igeret ha-ḳodesh (ff. 278r-285v). Yosef ben Shlomoh Ṭiṭtsiḳ (Riṭ), Perush Tehilim (ff. 288r-298r). Commentary on Lamentations (ff. 303r-313v). Pieces of rhymed prose and poetry (ff. 314r-318v). A homily in Arabic (ff. 320r-325r).
